languages.text: {n}Металлические пальцы смыкаются на ошейнике Глейто.{/n} "Вы убедили меня — в бездну Веабос-6, мое место не здесь. Я готов снова нести службу".
{n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."
languages.original_text: {n}Металлические пальцы смыкаются на ошейнике Глейто.{/n} "Вы убедили меня — в бездну Веабос-6, мое место не здесь. Я готов снова нести службу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The metallic fingers close on Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the abyss with Vheabos VI, my place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."
{n}The metallic fingers close on Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the abyss with Vheabos VI, my place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

{n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."
{n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

languages.text: {n}金属の指がグライトの首輪を掴んだ。{/n}「あなたの言う通りです。ヴィアボス・VIなどどうでもいいです。私の場所はここにはありません。再び奉仕する準備ができました」
languages.original_text: {n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}金属の指がグライトの首輪を掴んだ。{/n}「あなたの言う通りです。ヴィアボス・VIなどどうでもいいです。私の場所はここにはありません。再び奉仕する準備ができました」

languages.text: {n}Metallfinger schließen sich um Glaitos Halsband.{/n} "Ihr habt mich überzeugt. Zur Leere mit Vheabos-VI! Mein Platz ist nicht hier. Ich bin bereit, erneut zu dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Metallfinger schließen sich um Glaitos Halsband.{/n} "Ihr habt mich überzeugt. Zur Leere mit Vheabos-VI! Mein Platz ist nicht hier. Ich bin bereit, erneut zu dienen."

languages.text: {n}Ses doigts métalliques se referment sur le collier de Glaito.{/n} « Vous m'avez convaincu. Que le vide emporte Vhéabos-VI. Je n'ai rien à faire ici. Je suis prêt à servir de nouveau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses doigts métalliques se referment sur le collier de Glaito.{/n} « Vous m'avez convaincu. Que le vide emporte Vhéabos-VI. Je n'ai rien à faire ici. Je suis prêt à servir de nouveau. »

languages.text: {n}Sus dedos de metal se cierran en torno al collar de Glaito.{/n} «Me ha convencido. Al vacío con Vheabos VI. Este no es mi sitio. Estoy listo para servir una vez más».
languages.original_text: {n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus dedos de metal se cierran en torno al collar de Glaito.{/n} «Me ha convencido. Al vacío con Vheabos VI. Este no es mi sitio. Estoy listo para servir una vez más».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙用金属手指抚摸着格雷托的项圈。{/n}“我被你说服了。去他的维博斯六号星吧，这里根本不是我该待的地方。我已经准备好再次为你效力了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙用金属手指抚摸着格雷托的项圈。{/n}“我被你说服了。去他的维博斯六号星吧，这里根本不是我该待的地方。我已经准备好再次为你效力了。”

languages.text: {n}Metal parmakları, Glaito'nun tasmasını sarıyor.{/n} "Beni ikna etmeyi başardın. Uçsuz, Vheabos VI'nın belasını versin. Benim yerim burası değil. Yeniden hizmet etmeye hazırım."
languages.original_text: {n}Metal fingers close around Glaito's collar.{/n} "You have convinced me. To the void with Vheabos VI. My place is not here. I am ready to serve once more."

traits.locale_text: {n}Metal parmakları Glaito'nun tasmasını sarar.{/n} "Beni ikna etmeyi başardın. Uçsuz Vheabos VI'nın belasını versin. Benim yerim burası değil. Bir kez daha hizmet etmeye hazırım."
